channel.title: Tormented PK - The one and only!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/cooltext959517707_zps408e0617.png[/img] [B][URL=http://tpkreborn.com][COLOR=#996600]Forums[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#996600]| [/COLOR][URL=http://www.tpkreborn.com/playnow][COLOR=#996600][B]Web Client[/B][/COLOR][/URL][B][COLOR=#996600] | [/COLOR][/B][/B][B][B][B][URL=http://www.tpkreborn.com/playnow/Client.rar][COLOR=#996600]Downloadable Client[/COLOR][/URL][/B][/B][/B]
[/CENTER] [COLOR=#663300][B]Introduction [/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Welcome one and all to Tormented PK's official google Advertisment thread. Surely, you must be curious as to who and what we are. Simply put, we're a community. We thrive to give you, the players, the best time possible. If you feel something should be implemented into the forums or the server you can always suggest it to us via the [/COLOR][B][URL=http://"http://tpkreborn.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?fid=12"][COLOR=#663300]Feedback Forum[/COLOR][/URL][/B][COLOR=#663300]. Our staff team consists of a group of [B]mature[/B] and [B]hardworking [/B]members who've proved they are capable of such responsibility.
[B]Tormented PK[/B] has been around since [B]2010[/B] and was originally a 508. The server was recently brought back as a 639 and has been around for approximately a month.
[I]The staff team;[/I]
[/COLOR][CENTER][COLOR=#663300][B][U]The Developers [/U][/B][/COLOR][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/ingadmin_zps9ede47e2.png[/img][COLOR=#663300]William [/COLOR][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/ingadmin_zps9ede47e2.png[/img][COLOR=#663300]Sir Tom[/COLOR] [COLOR=#663300] [U][B]Server Administrators [/B][/U][/COLOR][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/ingadmin_zps9ede47e2.png[/img][COLOR=#663300]Hyradar [/COLOR][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/ingadmin_zps9ede47e2.png[/img][COLOR=#663300]Aspen [/COLOR][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/ingadmin_zps9ede47e2.png[/img][COLOR=#663300]Brock[/COLOR] [COLOR=#663300][U] [B]Server Moderator [/B][/U][/COLOR][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/ingmod_zps0af7fe4a.png[/img][COLOR=#663300]Eric [/COLOR][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/ingmod_zps0af7fe4a.png[/img][COLOR=#663300]Cherry [/COLOR][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/ingmod_zps0af7fe4a.png[/img][COLOR=#663300]Zaros[/COLOR] [COLOR=#663300] [/COLOR][U][B][COLOR=#663300]Forum Moderators [/COLOR][/B][/U][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/ingmod_zps0af7fe4a.png[/img][COLOR=#663300]Conan [/COLOR][IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/ingmod_zps0af7fe4a.png[/img][COLOR=#663300]A B[/COLOR]
[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/1render1s_zpsb37c1c70.png[/img] [B]Features - [/B]24/7 Uptime [B]- [/B]Majority of skills trainable [B]- [/B]Quests; Druidic Ritual Quest was released yesterday [B]- [/B]Webclient[B] - [/B][I]Highscores (Not yet released) [/I][B]- [/B]Unique Home environment[B] - [/B]Kill/Death Ratio - Friendly staff and community - Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demons, Nex [B]AND MUCH MORE! - [/B]Barrows[B] - [/B]Vote 4 Rewards system - Experienced and Professional Coders - God Wars Dungeon - Flawless PVP - PKpoint Shop - Start Package - Several Dungeons - HD/LD Full-screen/Re-sizable [I]- Fight Pits (Currently Being Added)[/I] - Active Staff Team - Active Forums - Character Appearance Customization - Comfortable Exp Rates - Slayer Tasks (With Difficulty) - Stable and Balanced Economy
[IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/1render1_zps4d74c867.png[/img] [CENTER][Spoiler= Media] [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/TormentedPK2_zpsa2d415fc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/TormentedPK15_zpsa5ca80db.png[/img] [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/TormentedPK66_zps267e288b.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/TormentedPK102_zpsb54cb40a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/TormentedPK162_zps5e967c26.png[/img] [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/TormentedPK158_zps3e710dfe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/TormentedPK67_zps5dd5f9a4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/TormentedPK48_zps8628f052.png[/img] [IMG]http://i872.photobucket.com/albums/ab284/bullzeye48/TormentedPK195_zps7f207035.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JFTvwa0.png[/img][/Spoiler]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Tormented PK - The one and only!
item.dc:creator: @l11 l
item.description:
@l11 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:509121”]Nice, that’s a comfortable JFrame look-and-feel.

You have a lot of staff for a little playerbase.[/quote]

Also, try making the forums non-flash since its not accessible from phones and iPads

Read full topic
item.source: Tormented PK - The one and only!

item.title: Tormented PK - The one and only!
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

[CENTER]
[COLOR=#996600]Forums[/COLOR][COLOR=#996600]| [/COLOR][COLOR=#996600]Web Client[/COLOR][COLOR=#996600] | [/COLOR][COLOR=#996600]Downloadable Client[/COLOR]

[/CENTER]
[COLOR=#663300]Introduction
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Welcome one and all to Tormented PK’s official google Advertisment thread. Surely, you must be curious as to who and what we are. Simply put, we’re a community. We thrive to give you, the players, the best time possible. If you feel something should be implemented into the forums or the server you can always suggest it to us via the [/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Feedback Forum[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]. Our staff team consists of a group of mature and hardworking members who’ve proved they are capable of such responsibility.

Tormented PK has been around since 2010 and was originally a 508. The server was recently brought back as a 639 and has been around for approximately a month.

The staff team;

[/COLOR][CENTER][COLOR=#663300]The Developers
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]William
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Sir Tom[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#663300]
Server Administrators
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Hyradar
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Aspen
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Brock[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#663300]
Server Moderator
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Eric
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Cherry
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Zaros[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#663300]
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Forum Moderators
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]Conan
[/COLOR][COLOR=#663300]A B[/COLOR]

[/CENTER]

[B]Features

  • [/B]24/7 Uptime
    - Majority of skills trainable
    - Quests; Druidic Ritual Quest was released yesterday
    - Webclient[B]
  • [/B]Highscores (Not yet released)
    - Unique Home environment[B]
  • [/B]Kill/Death Ratio
  • Friendly staff and community
  • Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demons, Nex [B]AND MUCH MORE!
  • [/B]Barrows[B]
  • [/B]Vote 4 Rewards system
  • Experienced and Professional Coders
  • God Wars Dungeon
  • Flawless PVP
  • PKpoint Shop
  • Start Package
  • Several Dungeons
  • HD/LD Full-screen/Re-sizable
    - Fight Pits (Currently Being Added)
  • Active Staff Team
  • Active Forums
  • Character Appearance Customization
  • Comfortable Exp Rates
  • Slayer Tasks (With Difficulty)
  • Stable and Balanced Economy


[CENTER][Spoiler= Media]
